component.name: Nihongo
component.summary: Useful application for Japanese kanji & kana input

description.p: Type small latin/romaji to input hiragana, and capital latin/romaji to input katakana. Search for kanji using their romaji pronounciation on the entry top right and find the kanji you want in the list below.
Simple, beautiful design, fast performance and more than 10000 kanji to chose from.
